plot: Robby is a teen who appears to have it all. But is it all a facade? A coming-of-age faith-based story that offers a message to us all: When we feel the most alone and trapped, we can catch a glimpse of God.
title: Digital Diary: Robby
plot_es: Robby is a teen who appears to have it all. But is it all a facade? A coming-of-age faith-based story that offers a message to us all: When we feel the most alone and trapped, we can catch a glimpse of God.
plot_en: Robby is a teen who appears to have it all. But is it all a facade? A coming-of-age faith-based story that offers a message to us all: When we feel the most alone and trapped, we can catch a glimpse of God.
